data.name: Warfare 1944
data.detailed_description:
Warfare 1944 is a community developed game similar to Red Orchestra, Forgotten Hope, and Battlefield 1942. Our objective is to revive many elements of older games that we miss in modern shooters, and to simply build a game that our own personal community can enjoy.

The first versions of Warfare 1944 will cover basic infantry combat, with tactical objectives and modes that encourage teamwork and coordination. Future versions of Warfare 1944 will include new factions, theaters of war, modes, and mechanics.

What can you do in Warfare 1944?


  • Lead an infantry squad
  • Capture a town
  • Charge the beaches of Normandy

What does Warfare 1944 play like?


  • Shoots like Battlefield
  • Plays like Red Orchestra
  • Feels like Forgotten Hope

What are your plans for Warfare 1944?


  • As many simultaneous players as possible
  • A wide variety of equipment and vehicles
  • High levels of team coordination and cohesion

If you are interested in contributing to our projects, you can file an application through our website. Additionally, we're hoping to include workshop support for community contributions as soon as possible. Our games are always a work in progress, and expand over time as our community grows.

We hope you enjoy Warfare 1944

data.short_description: Warfare 1944 is a World War II tactical shooter similar to games such as Red Orchestra, Forgotten Hope, and Battlefield 1942. The game is developed by the community development studio Drakeling Labs, and is currently in early access.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 / Radeon X1600 @ 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® Geforce GTX 960M / Radeon HD 7750 @ 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
